snippet.title: WILL: Follow The Light Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
The gameplay reveal trailer offers players a first look at environments and characters from Will’s ruined hometown where a community tries desperately to recover, showcases the game’s simulated yacht controls and open seas, reveals first puzzle gameplay and navigation, and highlights WILL: Follow The Light’s spectacular vistas set beneath the calm of the northern lights.

WILL: Follow The Light is coming in 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

Wishlist on WILL.GAME!
